metadata.name: #1 Military
metadata.description:
1 of 21
Since 2014 Ukraine has been at war. The story was repeated - Ukrainians felt the dominance of Russia again, which for many decades destroyed what they have always struggled for - their independence. As a result, the
state "exploded" a phenomenon that people called "zhovto-blakytnyi boom" ("yellow-blue boom"). The coloring of the general and private space in the colors of the national flag was a way of "pro-tecting the attacker".The first painted objects were bridges. They became a symbol of uni-
ty of Ukraine, seams, which did not let it plunge into pieces. But very
quickly these colors covered all of the Ukraine: houses, yards, play-
grounds, trees, fences, bus stops and even garbage cans.
Today in Ukraine there is a full-scale war with Russia. And this phenomenon takes on a new meaning.


Part of the money from the sale will be donated to the Ukrainian army.
